name: Rectify Season 1
summary:
在监狱里度过了漫长的十九年后，新的DNA证据的出现终于还了丹尼尔一个清白。然而，死囚监狱中的漫长岁月和巨大创伤无法挽回和修复，当丹尼尔重新回到了社会中时，他发现，一切早已经发生了翻天覆地的变化。
　　丹尼尔的归来让小镇上的居民们整日惴惴不安，在法律程序中，丹尼尔已经是无罪之身，但在世人的眼中，他依旧是那个残忍的杀害了自己女友的罪犯。无法摆脱的过去一次又一次的将企图重新生活的丹尼尔拽入泥潭，陌生的家庭成员，貌合神离的昔日旧友，所有的一切都提醒着丹尼尔，这个世界早已经不再友善，与此同时，越来越多的人开始质疑丹尼尔的清白。真相究竟是什么？丹尼尔能否摆脱目前的困境呢？

eps.name: Always There
eps.desc: Daniel Holden gets out of a prison in Georgia after 19 years as a result of his new lawyer (Jon Stern) successfully using new DNA evidence to overturn Daniels' conviction for raping and murdering his 16 year old girlfriend when he was 18 years old. Outside of the prison on the day of Daniels' release, a state senator (Roland Foulkes) says the government will continue to pursue its case against Daniel as the DNA evidence is a technicality and should not absolve Daniel from being tried for the crime. Before becoming a state senator Roland was the prosecutor in Daniel's trial. Roland meets later with a group of local officials, including former Sherriff CJ Pickens and current Sherriff Carl Daggett, and tells them to track down the primary witnesses from the Daniel Holden rape and murder case and that Daniels' release as a result of the DNA test does not mean that Daniel is innocent. The senator reveals that Daniel confessed to the rape and murder, and was found putting flowers on his girlfriend's dead body. Amantha drives Daniel around town to show him what changed. Daniel falls asleep. Sherriff Carl Daggett trails Amantha's car in his police cruiser and eventually stops. Two of these witnesses, George Melton and Trey Willis, meet by a creek in the woods. Trey tells George to tell the truth, and George asks Trey what is the truth. After Trey leaves George shoots himself in the head.

eps.name: Sexual Peeling
eps.desc: Daniel goes down and says hi to his mom, Janet, and asks if he can have a beer. Later, Daniel goes to a golf driving range and a buffet with his step-brother Ted Jr. Ted Jr. tells Daniel he is nervous about business at the family auto supply store if Daniel comes back to work there. Daniel tells Ted Jr. about getting attacked in the prison showers. At a family cookout, Daniel's step-father, Ted. Sr., asks Daniel's current lawyer if the government will leave Daniel alone. The lawyer says if it is not in their interest to do so, which it currently is not, they will keep pursuing a conviction against Daniel. Ted Jr.'s wife approaches Daniel at the family picnic and shares her favourite season with him. Daniel tells her that he didn't have windows in prison.

eps.name: Modern Times
eps.desc: The state senator Roland has a dalliance with a waitress from the local diner. He tells her that Daniel's victim was from a family "without means" while Daniel was a strange teenage boy. The waitress tells the senator that Daniel's sister, Amantha, has a relationship with the family's lawyer. Daniel retreats to the attic in his mom's house. He finds an old mixed tape from a girl. He later goes to a skate and bike park with his half brother Jared. Amantha is out drinking with the lawyer Jon. A man asks her if Daniel is going to live at home, and she says she doesn't know. Amantha tells Jon that the man was the brother of the girl that was raped and murdered 19 years ago.

eps.name: Plato's Cave
eps.desc: Daniel goes shopping with his mom. Jon talks to the state prosecutor; Sheriff Daggett talks to Trey. At a seminar out of town, a buddy talks to Ted Jr. about an illicit business scheme. Daniel visits Tawney at her church, where she talks to him about getting baptized. On his walk home, Daniel runs into an old classmate willing to show him some kindness.

eps.name: Drip, Drip
eps.desc: Daniel takes a strange trip in the night. Returning to town, he visits the tire store to talk to Ted Sr. Returning home, Ted Jr.'s angry to learn from Tawney that she's trying to help Daniel find absolution. Despite Amantha's concerns, Daniel goes to get baptized as Tawney looks on, but his revelations aren't quite what she expected. Daniel has a late-night talk with Ted Jr. at the store.

eps.name: Jacob's Ladder
eps.desc: After the family mailbox is smashed, Amantha confronts Sheriff Daggett while Janet and Ted Sr. grow more concerned about Daniel's safety, wondering if he should leave town. Daniel visits a childhood spot with Amantha as Ted Jr. and Tawney retreat from him. Trey discovers George's body. Daniel visits Hannah's grave where Hannah's brother and some cohorts beat Daniel, sending him to the hospital.
